name: Fourgotten - GMTK Game Jam 2021
description:
Three children trapped within separate rooms of a large mansion must learn to work together if they wish to escape together. Will you be able to save them all? Or will someone be left behind?  Enjoy this puzzle-thriller made by an ensemble of newbies, who will return as veterans next year!

Controls: Arrow keys to move, 1, 2, 3 keys to switch characters. When red and blue are merged, we use 2 to switch to that character. E is for interactions.

Important: Click on the game to start. Otherwise movement won't be registered.

Current game build unfortunately has no exit (sorry kids) however as long as they're all together, consider that a win! If you're lucky, you may even find yourself a "True" ending afterall...

Director, Designer, Background Artist

Ethan Micallef

Lead Developer/Engineer

Erik Giesen Loo

Composer for Sound Effects and Title Screen

Adam Cleall - "CleallSongs"

Composer for Background Music

Sundaresh JS

Developer/Engineer, Item Artist

Character Artist and Animator
